transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good afternoon, madam.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Rajeev Mishra is speaking from IndiaMART. How are you, madam?
Customer: Hmm hmm, tell me.
Executive: Madam, will you open the system once? I have to take feedback on the product once.
Customer: Okay sir, give me 10 minutes time, I will call back you in 10 minutes.
Executive: You can message me on WhatsApp, okay?
Executive: Message me on WhatsApp. Okay.
Customer: Yeah.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive needs product feedback.

- Customer asked for 10 minutes to call back.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to message on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, product, whatsapp
